about.title: About me
about.primary: I have recently graduated with a master degree from University of Amsterdam, with a thesis focused on the blockchain technology
about.secondary: Since 2018, I have been interested in the web3 space and recently I decided to combine my professional career with my hobby!

projects.title: Master Thesis - Investigating Zero-Knowledge Protocols for Preserving Privacy in Coordination of Multi-Domain Applications
projects.description: The main objective of this work is to explore zero-knowledge protocol based approach to enhance privacy mechanisms on blockchain to prevent non-trusted parties from obtaining access to view and potentially exploit transactions published on the ledger.
